name: Pack of 6 Journey Through the Festive Season Christmas Cards
description:
A set of 6 witty yet heart-warming cards featuring a quirky illustrated journey through the festive season.

Bring a smile to all revellers with this light-hearted summary of the trials & tribulations of the festive season that we all love.

Christmas lovers and grumpy abstainers alike can appreciate this beautiful hand illustrated diagram detailing what to expect as we count down to Christmas.

Featuring an honest but warm hearted diagram highlighting the magic (and also a few of the amusing pitfalls) of Christmas.

Inside reads Merry Christmas.

The perfect card for anyone who likes to look on the bright side and have a little giggle.

Made from:
Printed digitally on 325gsm uncoated card stock, supplied with white envelopes.

Dimensions:
Cards are 21cm x 14.8cm when folded.

name: Pack of 6 Wordplay Christmas Cards
description:
A set of fun, bright and bold Christmas cards for the people in your life.

Bring a smile to someones face this festive season with a light-hearted word play Christmas card.

In crisp white with bold festive colours these cards say everything that needs to be said.

Merry Christmas Sprout, Merry Christmas Pudding & Merry Christmas Deer in bold lettering feature with corresponding illustrations.

The perfect card for all your friends and little sprouts, puddings & deers this Christmas time.

You can select 6 of 1 design or a mixed set of 6 with 2 of each design.

Made from:
Printed digitally on 325gsm uncoated card stock with kraft envelopes.

Dimensions:
Cards are 14.8cm x 14.8cm when folded.

The perfect cards for anyone this Christmas time.

Cards are available in teal, grey & magenta. You can choose from a set of 6 all the same colour or a mixed set with 2 of each colour.

Made from:
Printed digitally on 325gsm uncoated card stock with kraft envelopes.

name: Gemstone iPhone Cover
description:
A beautiful, bold iPhone case with illustrated gemstones.

Featuring a white background with contrasting pastel coloured & black outline hand drawn gemstones.

The perfect iPhone cover for a total gem.

The sides of this case are plain white and it is available for an iPhone 4 or 5.

Other phone types available on request.

name: 2014 Terrific Year A5 Wall Calendar
description:
A terrific A5 calendar to help you not only get organised, but make every day positive, fun & active.

The perfect calendar for the organised human. Every day features a little prompt to encourage you to inject a little light-heartedness into your 2014.

Ban TV for the day, make "that" phone call, take a day trip and go star gazing, just a few examples of the delights that 2014 could hold for you with this on the wall above your desk.

A5 size when folded, this petite calendar will fit in nicely on your wall, with pastel backgrounds meaning you can scribble all over it.

Runs from January 2014 to December 2014.

made from:
Printed on crisp 230gsm uncoated card stock.

dimensions:
A5 14.8cm x 21cm size when folded, each month is spread over 2 A5 pages.

The perfect cards to celebrate your friends/lovers acheivements or in fact on any regular day.

made from:
Printed digitally on 325gsm uncoated card stock supplied with a crisp white envelope.

dimensions:

name: 2014 Terrific Year Planner
description:
A terrific wall planner to help you not only get organised, but make every day positive, fun & active.

The perfect wall planner for the organised human. Every day features a little prompt to encourage you to inject a little light-heartedness into your 2014.

Ban TV for the day, make *that* phone call, take a day trip and go star gazing - just a few examples of the delights that 2014 could hold for you with this on the wall above your desk.

You can even play along and share your good times using #terrific2014 and see what everyone else is up to!

Large enough to give you plenty of space to write your plans down and stylish enough to make a statement on the wall.

Runs from January 2014 to December 2014.

Made from:
Printed onto beautiful satin coated 165gsm paper using UV resistant inks.

Sent to you rolled up in a postal tube to ensure it arrives to you in terrific condition.

P&P 2.75 for UK and 7.95 for overseas. 

Dimensions:
A1 size wall planner, leaving a good amount of space to write in each box! 84.1cm x 59.4cm

5-7 day delivery.

name: You're a Gem Greetings Card
description:
Beautiful illustrated greetings card with pastel coloured gemstones, suitable for use as thank you cards and many other occasions!

Bring some sparkle to your thank you cards or special birthdays with this sweet greetings card,

Featuring a simple gem illustration these will raise a smile from recipients for sure.

The front comprises a hand lettered message "You're a Gem" and the inside is left blank for your own message.

Made from:
Printed digitally on 325gsm un-coated card stock and come with white envelopes.

Dimensions:
Cards are 14.8cm x 14.8cm when folded.

name: You're a Very Good Egg Framed A2 Print
description:
You are a Very Good Egg print.

Bold and colourful print for a very good egg.

Bring a smile to the face of any tea/coffee drinker with this cheerful illustrated print

Who could resist the charm of a print that tells you what a good egg you are?

Featuring a vivid hand lettered message 'You're a Very Good Egg' and an illustrated boiled egg.

This vibrant A2 print comes with a simple matt white frame with plastic 'glass' for safety and ease of postage.

I have done my best to give an accurate picture of the colouring however monitor settings mean that it may not be 100% accurate.

As seen in the 'Girlfriends' house on ITV2!

name: 'Go Big Or Go Home' Extra Large Mug
description:
A seriously big mug for a seriously dedicated tea (or coffee!) drinker.

Why drink a regular sized beverage when you can go BIG?

Aside from the fact you get more tea, (which is a huge benefit) this mug will remind you that there's no point in doing things by halves.

Featuring a vivid hand lettered message 'Go Big or Go Home'.

The perfect gift for a lover, a friend, a colleague or anyone that will appreciate the encouraging message and surplus of drink that it can contain.

Available in black, teal or pink.

Made from:
Dishwasher and microwave proof ceramic mug.

Dimensions:
460ml (approx. 3/4 of a pint) mug

name: Love is all Rainbows & Unicorns Print A2 Framed
description:
Love is all Rainbows & Unicorns - don't we all know it?! If you need reminding sometimes or are just after a bright & lighthearted print to liven up your wall then this is perfect. 

This vibrant A2 print comes with a simple matt white frame with plastic 'glass' for safety and ease of postage.

I have done my best to give an accurate picture of the colouring however monitor settings mean that it may not be 100% accurate.

As seen in the 'Girlfriends' house on ITV2!

name: An Introduction to Baby Humans - New Baby Card
description:
A witty yet heart-warming congratulations card complete with an informative introduction to parenting.

Bring a smile to the face of a first time parent with this helpful introduction to life with a baby human.

From the outside this may look like a vibrant yet regular card, yet it opens up to reveal a beautiful hand illustrated diagram detailing what to expect as your first year as a parent.

Featuring an honest but un-patronising diagram highlighting the beauty and magic (and also a little of the lack of sleep) that comes hand in hand with a new baby.

The perfect card for anyone that's just welcomed a bundle of joy into their lives.

The card is gender neutral, however it is available with a variety of envelope colours for you to choose from - white, yellow, blue or pink.

Made from:
Printed digitally on 325gsm uncoated card stock.

Dimensions:
Cards are 14.8cm x 14cm when folded, flat dimensions are 14.8cm x 42cm.

name: A Guide to Being Married - Wedding Card
description:
A witty yet heart-warming congratulations card complete with an informative guide to the first year as a married couple.

Bring a smile to the face of newly married couples fresh from down the aisle with this light-hearted introduction to married life.

From the outside this may look like a vibrant yet regular card, but it opens up to reveal a beautiful hand illustrated diagram detailing what to expect in your first year of marriage.

Featuring an honest but un-patronising diagram highlighting the love and magic of your first year together, along with important advice and tips to stay a happy couple long after the big day.

The perfect card for a couple in love that don't take life too seriously.

Made from:
Printed digitally on 325gsm uncoated card stock.

Dimensions:
Cards are 14.8cm x 14cm when folded, flat dimensions are 14.8cm x 42cm.

name: Guide to Planning a Wedding - Engagement Card
description:
A witty yet honest congratulations card complete with an informative introduction to wedding planning.

Bring a smile to the face of a newly engaged couple with this informative guide to wedding planning.

From the outside this may look like a vibrant yet regular card, but it opens up to reveal a beautiful hand illustrated diagram detailing what to expect when planning your wedding.

Featuring an honest but un-patronising diagram highlighting the fun (and in some cases, the slightly less fun but still amusing) things that they need to face as a couple before they walk down the aisle.

The perfect card for anyone that's just got engaged and would welcome a gentle reminder of what it really entails.

Made from:
Printed digitally on 325gsm uncoated card stock.

Dimensions:
Cards are 14.8cm x 14cm when folded, flat dimensions are 14.8cm x 42cm.

name: Cute Pastel Patterned Postcard Set
description:
Beautifully subtle patterned post card writing set.

Bring some whimsy to your little notes with this sweet set of postcards.

Featuring subtle repeat patterns on pastel coloured backgrounds these will be useful for those little thank you notes, secret messages or just to tell someone you're thinking of them.

The front features an adorable pattern whilst the reverse is left completely blank for your message.

Very useful to have around the house, these postcards come in a set of 4 to keep you organised.

Each set features one of each of these designs:

Pink - cats

Yellow - pineapples

Turquoise - balloons

Blue - clouds

Made from:
Printed digitally on 325gsm uncoated card stock and come with white envelopes.

Dimensions:

name: Personalised Wedding Guest Illustration
description:
A quirky record of all your wedding guests & how they fit together.

Display this beautiful illustrated map of how all your wedding guests fit together on the big day as a talking point and then a memento long after the last guest has gone home.

Alternatively, this can be created as a table plan so guests can get the low down on who they're sitting with.

What better way to remember the people that surrounded you when you tied the knot?

This is available to be used as a keepsake display or as a table plan.

It can be provided unframed, or framed in a matt white wooden frame with styrene plastic safety 'glass'. If you require it framed please message me first as it is an additional 35.

Made from:
200gsm matt laminated paper stock.

Dimensions:
A2 size print 59.4cm x 42cm

name: 'Hooray' Celebration Box & Card
description:
A fun & special birthday box for when a card just isn't enough!

Bring a smile to the face of the recipient with this fun birthday in a box.

In glorious technicolour the card says what you want to say without mincing its words, and is complemented with a 'Hooray' badge, a brightly coloured mini bunting banner, a happy yellow balloon and a party blower to get them fully into the spirit of their birthday.

'Hooray It's Your Birthday' features prominently on the front, with a simple 'Happy Birthday' inside, with plenty of space for you to write a lovely message.

Made from:
Card: printed digitally on 325gsm uncoated card stockBalloon: latex (not suitable for children)Blower: Plastic and paperBanner: Printed digitally on 120gsm paper stock and hand finished with yellow twine and yellow polka dot washi tape

Dimensions:
Cards are 14.8cm x 14.8cm when folded.Box is 16cm x 23.5cm x 2cm deep.

name: Hand Drawn Patterned Thank You Card
description:
Simple patterned thank you card.

Bring some whimsy to your thank you letters with this quirky thank you card.

Featuring a repeat pattern of hand drawn clouds with 'thank you' written inside each.

The front & back comprise the thank you pattern and the inside is left blank for your own message.

Very useful to have around the house for improptu thank yous or to send out en masse after a wedding, birthday or other special occassion.

Available in simple and chic black & white or in a more subtle pastel turquoise with the pattern in white.

Made from:
Printed digitally on 325gsm uncoated card stock and come with white envelopes.

Dimensions:
Cards are 14.8cm x 10.5cm when folded.

name: 'Hooray it's your Birthday' Birthday Card
description:
A bold birthday card for a happy birthday.

Bring a smile to the face of whoever you may choose to send this card to with this straight to the point birthday card.

In glorious technicolour this card says what you want to say without mincing its words.

'Hooray It's Your Birthday' features prominently on the front, with a simple 'Happy Birthday' inside, with plenty of space for you to write a lovely message.

The perfect card to remind anyone that you're thinking of them on their birthday.

Made from:
Printed digitally on 325gsm uncoated card stock.

Dimensions:
Cards are 14.8cm x 14.8cm when folded.

name: I Love Your Face Greetings Card
description:

Bring a smile to the face of your lover with this straight to the point greetings card.

In glorious technicolour this card says what you want to say without mincing it's words.

"I Love Your Face" features prominently on the front, while the inside is left blank for you to tell them what else you love about them.

The perfect card for a cheeky friend or lover, husband or wife.

Made from:
Printed digitally on 325gsm uncoated card stock.

Dimensions:
Cards are 14.8cm x 14.8cm when folded.

name: Cute Pastel Patterned Birthday Card
description:
Beautifully subtle patterned birthday cards available in a set or individually.

Bring a smile to anyones face with these sweet birthday cards.

Featuring subtle repeat patterns on pastel coloured backgrounds with modern yet light-hearted hand lettering.

'Happy Birthday' features prominently on the front, and is repeated more subtley inside leaving plenty of room for your message.

These cards are perfect for most birthdays and come in a set of 4 to keep you organised.

Each design is sold seperately or come in a mixed set of 4.

Pink - cats

Yellow - pineapples

Turquoise - balloons

Blue - clouds

Made from:
Printed digitally on 325gsm uncoated card stock and come with white envelopes.

Dimensions:
Cards are 14.8cm x 14.8cm when folded.

name: Wedding Invitation Sample
description: A wedding invitation sample including a main postcard and information card. Please indicate to me when you check out which range you would like to receive.

name: Lucky in Love Greetings Card
description:
A sentimental greetings card reminding your lover that you think you're lucky to have them.

Bring a smile to the face of your lover with this romantic and heartfelt greetings card.

In glorious technicolour this card tells your lover just how much they're loved.

"Being in love is as lucky as anyone can ever really be" features prominently on the front, while the inside is blank for your own special love letter.

The perfect card for a cheeky friend or lover, husband or wife, on valentines day, your anniversary or just because you want to remind them that they are loved.

Made from:
Printed digitally on 325gsm uncoated card stock and comes with a white envelope.

Dimensions:
Cards are A5 size (21cm x 14.8cm) when folded.
